comments:
If the GUI provider is down when the user logs in the initialization of
the Chart Customization manager fails (cuz the service is down).
If you then starts the GUI service and relogin it by passes the re-initialization.
A subsequent attempt to do anytihg with charts will fail with:
Exception occurred during event dispatching:
java.lang.RuntimeException: AperiChartCustomizationManager not initialzed

Also corrected the saving of chart customization for batch reports.
